name: What's the rules?
description:
You know the rules and so do I! Oh wait, you don’t know the rules, do you?Well, I guess it’s time to find out what they are. And what’s the better way to find out rather than playing the game, but be careful, every 10 seconds rules are going to change! What can I say, wish you luck I guess? Only 1% of people can beat this game, can you?

Hi! We would like to present you our simple but fun puzzle game full of surprises. Fast-paced time killer that challenged your brain to think outside a box. The entire game doesn’t contain any words except the title screen along with basic point and click mechanics which makes it accessible to anyone. Can you beat all the levels and reach glory that only few can?

We have created all the music, but we used graphics that were not made during the jam with few exceptions.

TEAM:
  • Krzysztof Tomaszek - Game Designer/Programmer/Script Writer
  • Jakub Szpyra - Game Designer/Music Director/Graphic Designer
